name: get_awesome_product_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool amazon_data_scraper_v2.
Tool description: Amazon Data Scraper is the easiest way to get access to products, price, sales and reviews data from amazon in JSON format
API description: Fetches detailed information about a product using a given product ID from the Amazon Data Scraper API.

productid.description: The unique identifier for the product to retrieve details for.
